title: Restoring Your Marriage After Infidelity, Part 4
itunes:author: John Fuller & Greg Smalley
itunes:summary: Emotional pain is probably a much bigger deal than you think. John and Greg give you tips on how to help yourself recover from painful situations. Featuring Mona and Gary Shriver.
description: Emotional pain is probably a much bigger deal than you think. John and Greg give you tips on how to help yourself recover from painful situations. Featuring Mona and Gary Shriver.
